description:
Focused study on an instrument forms the central pillar for
the BMus Majors in piano, strings, brass, wind and
percussion. Normally undertaken in the second year of
study, this module usually follows as the third in a
sequence of eight modules and as the second
performance presentation formally assessed for the
degree if the student is pursuing an instrumental major.
The module may also be taken by those pursuing a
second major in the relevant instrument, by Young Artists,
and electively by some students on the Music & Society or
Music, Collaboration & Production majors.
title: Advanced Juried Performance Presentation
